thread.title: Ex-Banker Tells Tales of High-Flying Days
thread.title_full: Ex-Banker Tells Tales of High-Flying Days

title: Ex-Banker Tells Tales of High-Flying Days
text:
julie.steinberg@wsj.com July 15, 2015 7:52 p.m. ET 
In John LeFevre’s new book, “Straight to Hell: True Tales of Deviance, Debauchery, and Billion-Dollar Deals,” the former Citigroup Inc. bond-syndicate banker recounts lurid tales of his time in the industry on three continents. 
Mr. LeFevre, who worked for Citigroup in New York, London and Hong Kong between 2001 and 2008, gives a comprehensive run-down of how deals were done then. 
One scene features a meeting in a Hong Kong... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
